private  java.util.Map<Action,Action> CalculateAlternatives(SCState predState, Action taken)
          calculates all the possible coupling(atomic section placements) of action that could of been done to prevent the current transition.

CalculateAlternatives

private java.util.Map<Action,Action> CalculateAlternatives(SCState predState,
                                                           Action taken)
calculates all the possible coupling(atomic section placements) of action that could of been done to prevent the current transition.
if one of the incoming actions belongs to a thread with the same pid as the one to be prevented, it is coupled with null !

Parameters:
predState -
taken -
Returns:

                                                    int pid)
